resources.string: UnlockAtHome v.1.1 2010 Copyright (C) Accedo Servicios Web S.L.U.
Wifi must be enabled on phone to select the unlocked networks
Pattern lock must be enabled to use this application, activate it, then please return and select some secure located network(s)
Remember this: be carefull is YOUR RESPONSABILITY to not forget the unlock pattern while this application is installed and active!
Please select the networks where you want to disable the lock pattern while connected
Tap to modify networks lock configuration
Show or hide the lock status icon on status bar
Keep wifi always on while connected to a whitelisted network
Status for wifi sleep policy when disconnected of a whitelisted network
